ModuleDescription: Orchestral Repertoire for Percussion is an orchestral repertory class designed to give orchestral playing experience to the percussion majors of YSTCM. In 13 sessions throughout the semester, the class will read and rehearse significant orchestral repertoire for percussion. Repertoire selected in this module will build on and complement repertoire studied in MUA3129. Percussion students consolidate and further develop technical, musical, and stylistic skills and knowledge essential to this repertoire’s effective execution. This module continues to develop professional audition performance techniques and skills.
Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
